decision_process.title: Initial URL Analysis
decision_process.description: The AI first examines the URL structure for suspicious patterns
decision_process.educational_note: URLs are the first line of defense - they often reveal malicious intent

decision_process.title: Domain Reputation Check
decision_process.description: The system checks the domain against known threat databases
details: Analyzing domain age and registration details
Examining domain popularity and traffic patterns
decision_process.educational_note: Domain reputation is crucial - new or flagged domains are high-risk

decision_process.title: Content Pattern Analysis
decision_process.description: If content is provided, the AI analyzes text patterns and structure
decision_process.educational_note: Phishing content often uses psychological manipulation techniques

decision_process.title: Machine Learning Classification
decision_process.description: Advanced ML algorithms process all features to make final decision
decision_process.educational_note: ML models learn from thousands of examples to recognize patterns

feature_analysis.name: Url Structure
feature_analysis.description: How the URL is constructed and formatted
feature_analysis.educational_note: Phishing URLs often have suspicious patterns like extra subdomains or misspelled domains

findings: URL structure appears normal with no obvious suspicious patterns
analysis_result.explanation: URL structure analysis checks for suspicious patterns and formatting

feature_analysis.name: Domain Reputation
feature_analysis.description: Historical reputation and trustworthiness of the domain
feature_analysis.educational_note: New or previously flagged domains are more likely to be malicious

findings: Domain appears to have normal characteristics
analysis_result.explanation: Domain reputation analysis checks historical trustworthiness

feature_analysis.name: Content Analysis
feature_analysis.description: Analysis of webpage content and text patterns
feature_analysis.educational_note: Phishing sites often copy legitimate content with subtle changes

findings: No content provided for analysis
analysis_result.explanation: Content analysis examines text patterns and suspicious phrases

feature_analysis.name: Security Indicators
feature_analysis.description: SSL certificates, HTTPS usage, and security headers
feature_analysis.educational_note: Legitimate sites typically have proper security certificates

findings: URL uses HTTPS encryption for secure data transmission
analysis_result.explanation: Security indicators check for HTTPS, certificates, and security headers

feature_analysis.name: Behavioral Patterns
feature_analysis.description: Unusual redirects, popup behaviors, and user interaction patterns
feature_analysis.educational_note: Phishing sites often use deceptive techniques to steal information

findings: No suspicious behavioral patterns detected
analysis_result.explanation: Behavioral analysis detects unusual redirect and interaction patterns

confidence_breakdown.reliability_assessment: Low reliability - insufficient evidence for confident classification
confidence_breakdown.interpretation: The AI has low confidence, suggesting the content is ambiguous or lacks clear indicators
factors_affecting_confidence: Quality and completeness of input data
Number of detectable features and patterns
Consistency across multiple analysis methods
Comparison to known examples in training data
Presence of clear vs ambiguous indicators

what_is_phishing.definition: Phishing is a cybercrime where attackers impersonate legitimate organizations to steal sensitive information like passwords, credit card numbers, or personal data.
common_methods: Fake emails that look like they're from banks or popular services
Suspicious websites that mimic legitimate login pages
Text messages with urgent requests and malicious links
Social media messages with too-good-to-be-true offers

how_ai_detects_phishing.machine_learning: AI systems learn from thousands of examples of legitimate and malicious content to recognize patterns that humans might miss
how_ai_detects_phishing.pattern_recognition: The AI analyzes URL structure, content patterns, metadata, and behavioral indicators simultaneously
how_ai_detects_phishing.continuous_learning: Detection models are regularly updated with new threat intelligence to catch evolving attack methods

key_warning_signs: Requests for sensitive information via email or text
Suspicious URLs that don't match the supposed sender
Generic greetings instead of personalized messages
Threats of account suspension or legal action
protection_tips: Always verify requests through official channels

learning_resources.description: Learn how to analyze URLs for suspicious patterns and phishing indicators

Examines color patterns that differ between AI and real images
Studies statistical properties unique to AI generation

decision_process.title: Metadata Extraction
decision_process.description: The AI first examines the image's metadata for generation signatures
details: Checking EXIF data for camera information
Analyzing creation timestamps and software signatures
Detecting AI tool watermarks or signatures
decision_process.educational_note: Metadata often contains clues about how an image was created

decision_process.title: Pixel Pattern Analysis
decision_process.description: Statistical analysis of pixel distributions and mathematical patterns
decision_process.educational_note: AI-generated images have distinct mathematical signatures

decision_process.title: Frequency Domain Analysis
decision_process.description: Examining the image in frequency space to detect AI signatures
details: Detecting periodic patterns in frequency domain
Comparing frequency signatures to known AI patterns
decision_process.educational_note: Real photos and AI images have different frequency characteristics

decision_process.title: AI Classification
decision_process.description: Machine learning models combine all features for final classification
details: Processing extracted features through neural networks
Comparing patterns to trained AI detection models
Calculating confidence scores for each classification
decision_process.educational_note: Multiple AI techniques work together for accurate detection

findings: Metadata analysis examines file creation information

findings: Frequency domain analysis reveals spectral characteristics
AI-generated content often has distinct frequency signatures
Comparing frequency patterns to known AI generation models
analysis_result.explanation: Frequency analysis examines spectral characteristics of the content

feature_analysis.name: Texture Analysis

findings: Texture analysis examines surface patterns and consistency
AI often struggles with maintaining consistent textures
Looking for unnatural smoothing or repetitive patterns

feature_analysis.name: Artifact Detection
feature_analysis.description: Detection of AI generation artifacts and inconsistencies
feature_analysis.educational_note: AI generation process can leave telltale artifacts in the final output

findings: Searching for telltale AI generation artifacts
Examining compression patterns and digital signatures
Looking for inconsistencies that reveal synthetic origin

Presence of clear vs ambiguous indicators

what_is_ai_content.definition: AI-generated content is media (images, videos, audio, text) created by artificial intelligence algorithms rather than humans or traditional recording devices.
what_is_ai_content.why_it_matters: As AI generation becomes more sophisticated, it's important to distinguish between authentic and synthetic content for security, authenticity, and trust.

detection_principles.statistical_analysis: AI detection looks for mathematical patterns and statistical signatures that are characteristic of machine-generated content
detection_principles.artifact_detection: AI generation processes often leave subtle artifacts or inconsistencies that can be detected with specialized algorithms
detection_principles.metadata_analysis: Digital forensics techniques examine file metadata and creation information for clues about content origin

specific_techniques.pixel_analysis: Examining pixel value distributions and mathematical patterns unique to AI image generation
specific_techniques.frequency_analysis: Analyzing the image in frequency domain to detect artificial generation signatures
specific_techniques.neural_network_detection: Using specialized neural networks trained to recognize AI-generated image characteristics
